mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO , A.TITLE AS TITLE , A.CONTENT AS CONTENT , A.WRITER AS WRITER , A.WRITE_DATE AS WRITE_DATE , A.LIKE_CNT AS LIKE_CNT , A.VIEW_CNT AS VIEW_CNT , A.IS_DEL AS IS_DEL , A.CATEGORY_CD AS CATEGORY_CD , B.CATEGORY_NM AS CATEGORY_NM , A.MENU_CD AS MENU_CD FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_CD = B.CATEGORY_CD ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE DESC , A.BOARD_NO DESC
